abstracts.cdata!:
The project will enable Pakistan Western
            Railway to finance the following high priority items: (1)
            renewal and improvement of track and bridges; (2)
            rehabilitation and improvement of workshops; (3) increase of
            line capacity by modernizing signal and telecommunication
            equipment and by remodelling yards and crossing stations;
            and (4) consulting services to assist PWR in management,
            operations and accounting.
